articles.description: The new breakfast-lunch restaurant — fox/hound — is now open in Due South Coffee in Hampton Station west of downtown Greenville and is the product of couple Will and Katie
articles.content:
GREENVILLE  Life has a funny way of taking you to places you were meant to be, and when you least expect it.
You could say thats how Will and Katie LeaMond came to own a restaurant in Greenville, bu… [+7166 chars]
